org.finra.herd.dao

Interface EmrDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmrDaoImpl

    public interface EmrDao
    A DAO for Amazon AWS EMR.

    • Method Detail

      • addEmrMasterSecurityGroups

        List<String> addEmrMasterSecurityGroups(String clusterId,
                                        List<String> securityGroups,
                                        AwsParamsDto awsParams)
                                 throws Exception
        Add Security groups to the master node of EMR cluster.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - EMR cluster Id.
        securityGroups - the security groups list.
        awsParams - the proxy details.
        Returns:
        the security groups that were added.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • addEmrStep

        String addEmrStep(String clusterId,
                  com.amazonaws.services.elasticmapreduce.model.StepConfig emrStepConfig,
                  AwsParamsDto awsParamsDto)
           throws Exception
        Add an EMR Step. This method adds the step to EMR cluster based on the input.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - EMR cluster ID.
        emrStepConfig - the EMR step config to be added.
        awsParamsDto - the proxy details.

        There are four serializable objects supported currently. They are 1: ShellStep - For shell scripts 2: HiveStep - For hive scripts 3: HadoopJarStep - For Custom Map Reduce Jar files and 4: PigStep - For Pig scripts.

        Returns:
        the step id
        Throws:
        Exception

      • createEmrCluster

        String createEmrCluster(String clusterName,
                        EmrClusterDefinition emrClusterDefinition,
                        AwsParamsDto awsParams)
        Create the EMR cluster.
        Parameters:
        awsParams - AWS related parameters for access/secret keys and proxy details.
        emrClusterDefinition - the EMR cluster definition that contains all the EMR parameters.
        clusterName - the cluster name value.
        Returns:
        the cluster Id.

      • getActiveEmrClusterByName

        com.amazonaws.services.elasticmapreduce.model.ClusterSummary getActiveEmrClusterByName(String clusterName,
                                                                                       AwsParamsDto awsParams)
        Get an Active EMR cluster by the cluster name. Cluster only in following states are returned: ClusterState.BOOTSTRAPPING, ClusterState.RUNNING, ClusterState.STARTING, ClusterState.WAITING
        Parameters:
        awsParams - AWS related parameters for access/secret keys and proxy details.
        clusterName - the cluster name value.
        Returns:
        the ClusterSummary object.
